short_summary: Sled, Self-Propelled, 2 Passenger, 2 Stroke Gasoline Engine
description: Genevieve Roach ... The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure Qty 33x Sled, Self-Propelled, 2 Stroke Gasoline Engine and ILS deliverables for delivery to Petawawa, Ontario. ...
full_summary:
=====================

**Sled, Self-Propelled, 2 Passenger, 2 Stroke Gasoline Engine Contract Opportunity**

* **Tender Title**: Sled, Self-Propelled, 2 Passenger, 2 Stroke Gasoline Engine
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01015105
* **Procurement Number**: W8476-236644/A
* **Publication Date**: November 29, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 17, 2023 at 13:00:00 (closed)
* **Amendment Date**: January 12, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A

**Contract Details**
--------------------

This procurement request is issued by the Department of National Defence for the acquisition of Sled, Self-Propelled, 2 Passenger, 2 Stroke Gasoline Engine and ILS deliverables. The contract will be delivered to Petawawa, Ontario, with a requested delivery date of 120 days after contract award.

**Key Features**
---------------

* Quantity: 33 units
* Delivery location: Petawawa, Ontario
* Requested delivery date: 120 days after contract award
* Security requirement: None
* Languages: Official languages of Canada (English and French)

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Attachments**
--------------

The following documents are available for download:

* Original Request for Proposal (RFP): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/29/e44b515b58ef623dc8e47fa855d681cf/en_rfp_w8476-236644-a_original.pdf>
* Amendment 1: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/
